channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Loop homology of moment-angle complexes in the flag case
item.description: arXiv:2403.18450v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We develop a general homological approach to presentations of connected graded associative algebras, and apply it to loop homology of moment-angle complexes $Z_K$ that correspond to flag simplicial complexes $K$. For arbitrary coefficient ring, we describe generators of the Pontryagin algebra $H_*(\Omega Z_K)$ and defining relations between them. We prove that such moment-angle complexes are coformal over $\mathbb{Q},$ give a necessary condition for rational formality, and compute their homotopy groups in terms of homotopy groups of spheres.
item.dc:creator: Fedor Vylegzhanin

item.title: The Chern class for $K_3$ and the cyclic quantum dilogarithm
item.description: arXiv:2104.14413v4 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this note we confirm the conjecture of Calegari, Garoufalidis and Zagier in their recent paper in Ann. Sci. \'{E}cole Normale Sup. that $R_\zeta=c_\zeta^2$, where $R_\zeta$ is their map on $K_3$ defined using the cyclic quantum dilogarithm and $c_\zeta$ is the Chern class map on $K_3$.
item.dc:creator: Kevin Hutchinson
